segments.text: Hi , charlie , are you busy this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I'm afraid that I've got plans tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to my parents ' house for my father's birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , wish him a happy birthday for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure thing . What are your plans for the evening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was just thinking of going to a movie tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if you can wait until tomorrow night , I'll go with you then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I've got people coming over tomorrow night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like this weekend just isn't going to work out for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds that way . Maybe some other time then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure.Hey , I'm sorry , but I've got to get going .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , me , too . It's about time I made a move .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say hello to your friends for me .
segments.speaker: S2
